references.paper_title: Mastering the game of go without human knowledge
references.reason: This paper introduces AlphaGo Zero, a groundbreaking AI that mastered Go without human data, fundamentally changing the landscape of AI and inspiring the tree search methods used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduced Chain-of-Thought prompting, a crucial technique for improving reasoning abilities in LLMs, which directly inspired the step-by-step reasoning approach used in this work.

references.paper_title: Tree of thoughts: Deliberate problem solving with large language models
references.reason: This paper proposed the "Tree of Thoughts" framework, which uses tree search to guide LLM reasoning, offering a methodological foundation for the CoMCTS approach introduced in this research.

references.paper_title: Monte carlo tree search boosts reasoning via iterative preference learning
references.reason: This paper integrates Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) with preference learning to enhance LLM reasoning, serving as a direct inspiration for the CoMCTS algorithm developed in this work.
